community_listings.title: Cloudflare Protection Active
community_listings.description: The Rhizome community page (https://rhizome.org/community/) is protected by Cloudflare's bot detection, which blocks automated scraping attempts. To fetch real community listings, browser automation (Playwright, Puppeteer, or Selenium) is required to bypass the JavaScript challenge.

next_steps: Update the rhizome-community.yml workflow to use Playwright or Puppeteer for browser automation. Example: Use 'microsoft/playwright-github-action' or install Playwright in the workflow.
